sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: More than 200 people rescued from the Mediterranean Sea were allowed to disembark at the Porto Pozzalo in Italy on Christmas Eve.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Pope Francis celebrates Christmas Eve Mass in front of 2,000 believers, emphasising working people and the littleness of Jesus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Catalonia reimposes a night-time curfew along with other restrictions on gatherings and businesses to fight a surge in COVID-19.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Thousands of travellers were forced to rethink their holiday plans amid the Omicron surge as Delta Lufthansa and United Airlines cancelled hundreds of flights on Christmas Eve.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Ski resorts in Austria's Salzburg region take a hit due to new COVID-related travel restrictions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: At least 13 people died after a migrant boat capsized off the coast of Greece.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It's the third accident with loss of life in as many days, with at least 27 people confirmed to have died in Greek waters this week alone.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The sinking scum as people's smugglers favour a more perilous route from Turkey to Italy, avoiding Greece's heavily patrolled Asian islands.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: A humanitarian ship carrying a group of 114 people rescued in the Mediterranean more than a week ago has been directed to the Sicilian port of Trapani. The organization running the autumn Viking boat welcomed the news. A doctor on board explained how people feared spending Christmas abundant. Where we are stranded at sea with a hundred and fourteen people that we rescued over a week ago from a vessel in distress. Amongst these survivors we have two newborns who are facing spending their first Christmas with us here on board and their mothers who have faced death and are continuing to suffer with us on board. As per maritime law, a rescue is only complete when the survivors have been disembarked in a place of safety.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: More than 200 migrants rescued by another humanitarian boat, the CI4, were allowed to disembark in the port of Pozzalo in Italy on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In total, the German vessel has saved more than 1,400 people in distress at sea over the past year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Catalonia, home to the city of Barcelona, reimposed a night-time curfew from Christmas Eve lasting for 15 days to fight a record surge in Covid-19 infections.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: A raft of other restrictions were also implemented, which will affect the community's 7.7 million people and hamper New Year's celebrations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: This bar owner says it's very complicated because with the situation tourists will no longer come to Barcelona.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Everything is cancelled.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: We've had a good night for now because we've only had these new restrictions for two days, but now it's going to get worse and I'm very afraid not being able to have a normal 31st or end of the year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Spain had hoped for a relaxed festive Christmas since 80% of its population of 47 million were vaccinated. But the incredibly fast spread of the Omicron variant is starting to put pressure on hospitals, with Catalonia having a quarter of all admittances in Spain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: A nightmare before Christmas. This comes as thousands of passengers around the world faced travel disruptions and flight cancellations on Christmas Eve.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The surge in coronavirus infections and the rise of the Omicron variant has pushed Austria, the Czech Republic, Italy and France to enforce tighter measures on arrivals, especially on those from high-risk countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Delta, United Airlines and Lufthansa have all reported staff shortages.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The German national carrier says it will cut its winter flight plan by around 10% as the spread of the new strain fuels travel uncertainty. That's 33,000 flight cancellations between the middle of January and February.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile US-based airline Delta says after exhausting all options and resources, it was forced to cancel 116 scheduled flights for Christmas Eve.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Many disappointed holidaymakers and families looking to reunite during the festive period now face a different kind of Christmas as once again Covid-19 disrupts one of the busiest travel periods of the year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: As the UK grapples with the spread of the new coronavirus variant, a large-scale booster programme is underway.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The government is aiming to offer a third vaccine dose to everyone 18 and over by December 31.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The Prime Minister, Boris Johnson, even used his Christmas message to encourage vaccination.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: After two years of this pandemic, I can't say that we're through it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: How can I?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: When Omicron is surging, where we all know we must together try to stop the spread, After two years of this pandemic, I can't say that we're through it. How can I?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: When Omicron is surging, where we all know we must together try to stop the spread of this new variant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And though the time for buying presents is theoretically running out, there is still a wonderful thing you can give your family and the whole country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: And that is to get that jab, whether it's your first or your second or your booster, so that next year's festivities are even better than this year's. And in the meantime, I thank you and I wish you all a very Merry Christmas. Omicron has become the dominant variant in the UK, where there have been record numbers of new cases.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: England has reinstated some restrictions, but more may come into effect after Christmas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Pope Francis celebrated Christmas Eve Mass before an estimated 2,000 people in St Peter's Basilica.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Going ahead with the service despite a resurgence in Covid-19, Francis urged the faithful to focus on the smallness of Jesus and remember that he came into the world poor.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: He said that is where Jesus is born, close to them, close to the forgotten ones of the peripheries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: He comes where human dignity is put to the test.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: He comes to ennoble the excluded where he first reveals himself to them, not to educated and important people, but to poor, working people. God tonight comes to fill with dignity the austerity of labour. He reminds us of the importance of granting dignity to men and women through labour.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The pontiff remained maskless throughout the service and continued.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This is the message. God does not rise up in grandeur, but lowers himself into smallness.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Smallness is the path that he chose to draw near to us, to touch our hearts, to save us and to bring us back to what really matters.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The 2,000 strong audience was far more than the 200 allowed in 2020 when Italy was in a full Christmas lockdown.

sentences.sentence: New travel regulations in Austria have already led to a wave of winter sport cancellations in the Salzburg region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: From the 25th, restrictions on people entering the country from the UK, the Netherlands, Denmark and Norway will be tighter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: One new rule includes a mandatory quarantine of 10 days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Only the triple vaccinated with a valid negative PCR test are exempt.

Every tourist destination relies on its internal market. So guests from Bulgaria are very important and valuable." Here, green certificates are only required inside, in hotels and restaurants, and masks must only be worn in lifts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Lisbon's National Toile Museum has a new ceramics exhibition dedicated to female artists.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The display celebrates the country's famous Azulejo tile, which features in both modern and contemporary designs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The presentation also reflects themes of oppression and gender inequality, as some of these works were produced during the Estado Novo dictatorship.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Boasting colourful and striking pieces from both public and private collections, Unknown Territories marks women's dedication to the industry over the last seven decades.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The Francisco de Goya exhibition at the Fundación Bel Air near Basel is a historical first.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: After 10 years of negotiations, 77 paintings, 51 drawings, 53 engravings and lithographs, all created by one of the last major court artists, have been assembled.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: A pioneer in the world of modern art, this is considered the most important exhibition ever devoted to the master outside of his native Spain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Housed in the vast halls of the Grand Palais Éphémère in Paris, German painter and sculptor Anselm Kiefer's latest exhibition continues his work on European memory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Featuring large-scale installations, gloomy canvases and striking yet minimalist tributes, the artist has dedicated his new pieces to the years of conflict that gave rise to the European Union.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Five years in the making, the collection bears a nod to the tormented work of the great German poet Paul Celan.
